tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Coaches (
    coach_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    coach_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    game_strategy TEXT,
    training_drills TEXT,
    performance_evaluations TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE PerformanceEvaluations (
    evaluation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    evaluation_score INT,
    player_id INT,
    coach_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES Players(player_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (coach_id) REFERENCES Coaches(coach_id)
);

CREATE TABLE TrainingDrills (
	drill_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	coach_id INT NOT NULL,
	drill_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	drill_duration INT,
FOREIGN KEY (coach_id) REFERENCES Coaches(coach_id)
);

CREATE TABLE PerformanceEvaluations (
	evaluation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	player_id INT NOT NULL,
	evaluation_date DATE,
	evaluation_result TEXT,
FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES Players(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE GameStrategies (
  strategy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  strategy_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  coach_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (coach_id) REFERENCES Coaches(coach_id)
);

CREATE TABLE TrainingDrills (
  drill_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  drill_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  duration_in_minutes INT,
  coach_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (coach_id) REFERENCES Coaches(coach_id)
);

CREATE TABLE PerformanceEvaluations (
  evaluation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  player_id INT,
  evaluation_date DATE,
  performance_score INT,
  coach_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES Players(player_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (coach_id) REFERENCES Coaches(coach_id)
);
